data.eml:eml: The genus Pseudexechia Tuomikoski re-characterized, with a review of European species (Diptera: Mycetophilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kjaerandsen, Jostein (2009): The genus Pseudexechia Tuomikoski re-characterized, with a review of European species (Diptera: Mycetophilidae). Zootaxa 2056: 1-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.186691
